title: The Moon and how it affects us. - 2nd ed.
creator_credit: Lee W. Gluckman and Coronet Films
brief_description: Uses footage from the Apollo 17 moon mission to describe the moon’s physical characteristics, its phases and its effect on the earth. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
